entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
